cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, CASE WHEN CMS_RoleUIElement.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Allowed, @ElementID AS ElementID, @ElementDisplayName AS ElementDisplayName FROM (SELECT CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND ((@SiteID = 0 AND SiteID IS NULL) OR SiteID = @SiteID))) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RoleUIElement ON ( CMS_RoleUIElement.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID AND CMS_RoleUIElement.ElementID = @ElementID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
